Kaazing JavaScript AMQP Demos

Kaazing WebSocket Gateway is a platform for building web applications that require high-performance, full-duplex communication between the browser and server. The demonstrations on this page show JavaScript-based AMQP clients that communicate directly with a remote message broker. For more information, see Checklist: How to Build JavaScript Clients Using Kaazing WebSocket Gateway.

JavaScript AMQP Demo

This demo uses an AMQP client library to send and receive messages using the AMQP protocol which communicates with a message broker such as Rabbit MQ or Apache Qpid by way of the Kaazing Gateway AMQP Proxy service.

AMQPClient API
